mapper.select: SELECT nl.NOTIFICATION_ID AS "notificationId", nl.MEMBER_ID AS "memberId", nl.TYPE AS "type", nl.MESSAGE AS "message", nl.IS_READ AS "isRead", TO_CHAR(nl.SENT_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS "sentAt", NVL(sam.TITLE, '알림') AS "title" FROM NOTIFICATION_LOG nl LEFT JOIN SAFETY_ALERT_MASTER sam ON nl.TYPE = '위험공표' AND sam.ALERT_ID = ( SELECT MAX(ALERT_ID) FROM SAFETY_ALERT_MASTER WHERE TITLE = SUBSTR(nl.MESSAGE, 1, 50) ) WHERE nl.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY nl.SENT_AT DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTIFICATION_LOG WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND IS_READ = 'N'
SELECT SETTING_ID AS settingId, MEMBER_ID AS memberId, NOTIFICATION_ENABLED AS notificationEnabled FROM SAFETY_ALERT_SETTINGS WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SAFETY_ALERT_SETTINGS ( SETTING_ID, MEMBER_ID, NOTIFICATION_ENABLED ) VALUES ( SEQ_SAFETY_ALERT_SETTINGS.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT ALERT_ID AS alertId, INGREDIENT_ID AS ingredientId, NATION AS nation, HAZARD_TYPE AS hazardType, TITLE AS title, DESCRIPTION AS description, PUBLICATION_DATE AS publicationDate FROM SAFETY_ALERT_MASTER WHERE ALERT_ID = #{alertId}
SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM SAFETY_ALERT_SETTINGS WHERE NOTIFICATION_ENABLED = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTIFICATION_LOG ( NOTIFICATION_ID, MEMBER_ID, TYPE, MESSAGE, IS_READ, SENT_AT ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTIFICATION_LOG.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{type}, #{message}, 'N', SYSTIMESTAMP )
